definition: to shave the whole head clean/crushing defeat
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Shaving down contributes to peak performance.
sentences.chinese: 剃光頭有助於提高成績。

sentences.english: His hair grew back thicker after he shaved his head.
sentences.chinese: 他剃光頭以後頭髮長得更濃密了。

sentences.english: Men with shaved heads were rated lower in attractiveness and also seen as being older.
sentences.chinese: 剃光頭的男子被認爲不太有吸引力，而且看上去更老。

sentences.english: She happened to bring up who was behind the total head-shaving idea.
sentences.chinese: 她碰巧告訴我是誰給她出的這個剃光頭的主意。

sentences.english: The world doesn’t need another gag about a girl with come in her hair.
sentences.chinese: 這個世界大可不必擔心剃光頭的女孩是誘人的禍水啦。

sentences.english: Q. Kim's coach once promised toshave his hair if she won a Grand Slam.
sentences.chinese: 小克的教練承諾說當小克贏得一個大滿貫後就剃光頭。

sentences.english: Keep hair long coz you like it, shave bold if you want me to.
sentences.chinese: 留你喜愛的長髮，也能剃光頭如果你讓我這麼做。

sentences.english: Rachel: Pheebes, this woman is voluntarily bald.
sentences.chinese: 那個女人可是主動剃光頭的。

definition: to be an irksome presence (i.e. sth or sb one wishes were not there)
dew point/(coll.) (of a woman) to expose one of the three areas (nipples and genitals)
(of a man) to dress as a woman (idiom)
with dishevelled hair (idiom)/with one's hair down
overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
to mend one's ways (idiom)/to turn over a new leaf
to deserve praise for one's courage (idiom)
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
